sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { useState } from 'react' import { createquizz } from '../../actions/userActions' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const CreateQuizz = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const navigate=useNavigate() const [formData,setFormData]=useState({title:"",description:""}) const [Cquestion,setCQuestion]=useState("") const [questions,setQuestions]=useState([]) const [option,setOption]=useState({A:"",B:"",C:"",D:""}) const [ans,setAns]=useState([]) const [difficulty,setDifficulty]=useState(1) const handleSubmit=async(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() dispatch(createquizz(finalObjet)) navigate("/admin") } function handleChange(event){ setFormData({...formData,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } function handleQuestion(event) { setCQuestion(event.target.value) } function handleOption(event) { setOption({...option,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } function handleAns(event) { setAns({...ans,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } function iDifficulty(){ setDifficulty(difficulty+1) setQuestions([...questions,quest]) setCQuestion("") setOption({A:"",B:"",C:"",D:""}) setAns([]) } const fAns=Object.values(ans) const fOption=Object.values(option) const quizname=formData.title const quizdescription=formData.description const question=Cquestion const quest={question,fOption,fAns,difficulty} const finalObjet={quizname,quizdescription,questions} console.log(quest,"quest") return ( <>
Quizz title
Quizz description
{questions.map(question=>
  1. Q. {question.realQues}
    A. {question.fOption[0]}
    B. {question.fOption[1]}
    C. {question.fOption[2]}
    D. {question.fOption[3]}
    Correct ans : {question.fAns.map(a=>{a},)}
    difficulty : {question.difficulty}
)}
Question
Options
A
B
C
D
Answers
A
B
C
D
Difficulty : {difficulty}

) } export default CreateQuizz
